oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Productivity and Growth in Organic Value-chains (ProGrOV): Networks organization along organic foods value chains in Kenya. Case: Kales in Nairo - SUMMER chickens ”on herbs” - Spotless apples under roof - Organic hay fields as a floral resource for bees and other flower-visiting insects - Larvae for layers
